ComicInfo.Summary:
The Ash-Tree: For a hundred years, the family of Sir Matthew Fell meet violent ends at Castringham Hall due to the vengeance of a witch whom Sir Matthew had killed. Finally, the ash-tree at the hall is found to be full of giant killer spiders. When the tree is burned down, the witch's remains are discovered.
The Mezzotint: Williams discovers a framed engraving in which the figures keep moving when he isn't looking at them.
Lost Hearts: Stehen goes to live with his cousin Mr. Abney and is visited by spirits of other children who had come to stay with Abney. Eventually, the spirits strike back at Abney to kill him in return for using their hearts in his dark rituals.
Canon Alberic's Scrap-Book: Exploring an old church, Dennistoun finds a scrapbook full of rare lithographs which the attending priest encourages him to take; as a result, Dennistoun is visited by the Demon of the Night.
ComicInfo.Title: The Ash-Tree; The Mezzotint; Lost Hearts; Canon Alberic's Scrap-Book
ComicInfo.Characters: Bishop of Kilmore,Mrs. Chiddock,Sir Richard Fell,Mr. Crome,Sir Matthew Fell,Sir Matthew Fell II,William Crome,Mrs. Mothersole
